DOC.brief_summary: This study represent Phase II research program involve international collaboration Macquarie University ( Sydney , Australia ) implement Internet-based cognitive behavior therapy treatment anxiety depression French-speaking Canadians Atlantic Provinces . The primary objective establish clinical efficacy French-Canadian self-guided format version Wellbeing Course conduct randomized-control trial experimental group compare waitlist control group . A secondary objective demonstrate course 's acceptability participant ' satisfaction course .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Delivered Cognitive Behavior Therapy Anxiety Depression Amongst French Canadians
DOC.criteria: Residing NewBrunswick , NovaScotia , Prince Edward Island , Newfound land & Labrador Having identify French first official language speak good reading comprehension French . Reliable Internet access Clinically significant level depression anxiety reflect significant score follow measure : PHQ9 > 9 , GAD7 > 7 , Penn Stage Worry Questionnaire ≥ 45 , Social Phobia Inventory ≥ 19 , Panic Agoraphobia Scale ≥ 19 , answer yes question `` Is anxiety low mood problem '' Not currently participate cognitivebehavioral therapy No change medication 4 week prior study , change medication next 2 month Willing disclose personal information Presence psychotic symptom Presence severe depression indicate score ≥ 23 PHQ9 , score > 2 item 9 PHQ9
